SELECT #{item.orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sexCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.idTypeCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.employerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.telNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.relName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.relTelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.streetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.neighborhoodCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.houseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nationalityCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.aboCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.rhCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.educationCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.occupationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.marriageCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.codeSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.assignedPersonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.assignedPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.healthRecordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.healthRecordOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.msgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.employerTelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FROM DUAL

where id = #{item.id};
